Deer Creek....Ultimate Elegance.
While it is true that Deer Creek Golf Club is the best Broward County golf course, we are also home to spectacular South Florida event venues. We would love to host and cater all of the big events in your life. Our South Florida banquet rooms provide the perfect setting for a wide range of celebrations and events.
Celebrate With Deer Creek Golf Club!
Our South Florida country club is home to both indoor and outdoor event spaces, and we can tailor your event to include both settings! Our rooms are designed to accommodate any event you are hosting.
Spend the day golfing on our course to work up an appetite before heading into our South Florida banquet halls.
Weddings
Beautiful wedding venues in South Florida are not hard to come by, however few can truly compare to our stunning banquet rooms. With cascading waterfalls, lush greens, and elegant rooms choose from our selection of halls, with specialty
wedding menus
,
bridal shower
venues,
engagement parties
,
rehearsal dinners
, and more.
We will work with you to ensure you receive the wedding you deserve, offering dining and catering options from our esteemed
Deer Creek Grille
.
DEER CREEK FEATURED IN MARRIED IN PALM BEACH READ ARTICLE
Specialty Events
In addition to weddings and wedding-related events, our event spaces are perfect for a variety of celebrations, including but not limited to:
Baby Showers
Bat & Bar Mitzvahs
Birthday Parties
Corporate Events
Graduation
Holiday Dining
Quinceaneras
Reunions
Sweet Sixteens
Our venues have sweeping views of our South Florida golf course. Hosting an event coming up that you don’t see above?
Contact us
today and we’ll discuss ways to cater our event spaces and menus to your needs!

Catered Events at Deer Creek
Nestled in the heart of South Florida, our golf club offers a unique blend of picturesque landscapes and top-notch facilities, making it the perfect venue for your next event. Our professional events and catering team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, ensuring every detail is meticulously planned and flawlessly executed.
As one of the leading South Florida golf clubs,
Deer Creek Golf Club
facilitates various catering events from weddings and engagement parties to corporate team-building and class reunions. Our recently renovated Key West Banquet Room along with our other
stunning ballrooms
, provide the ideal setting for any occasion. Whether you’re hosting an intimate gathering or a grand celebration, our versatile spaces and exceptional culinary offerings will exceed your expectations.
Types of Catering Events Deer Creek Can Host
From customizing the perfect menu to creating signature cocktails as well as other personalized details, your catered event at Deer Creek Golf Club is in good hands with our professional team. Our
venues for special occasions
can accommodate a variety of events including weddings, corporate events, charity functions, private parties, and business luncheons, among others.
Weddings
It’s no wonder that Deer Creek Golf Club is one of
South Florida’s premier wedding venues
. Our indoor and outdoor event spaces, including our elegant ballroom and picturesque outdoor pavilion, provide a stunning backdrop for your special day and our fantastic catering staff whip up delectable menus your wedding guests will undoubtedly enjoy. Our dedicated wedding coordinators will work with you to create the wedding of your dreams.
Charitable Functions
We proudly support charitable functions, offering unique packages for
golf fundraising events
to help you raise funds and awareness for important causes. Our event planners will assist you in creating memorable and successful fundraising events, from silent auctions to gala dinners.
Corporate Events
For
corporate events
at our premier golf club in South Florida, we offer conference facilities with state-of-the-art technology to support presentations, video conferences, and other business needs. Our professional environment ensures productive meetings and gatherings. Additionally, team-building activities, including golf outings on our championship course, are available to take your corporate event to the next level and strengthen team bonds.
Business Luncheon
Host your next
business luncheon at Deer Creek
, where our elegant dining rooms offer a professional yet inviting atmosphere. Impress clients and colleagues with our exceptional service and gourmet menu options. Our culinary team will work with you to create a menu that fits the tone of your luncheon, whether you prefer a formal sit-down meal or a more casual buffet style.
Celebrations
Celebrate life’s milestones with our versatile spaces that can accommodate any number of guests. Whether it’s a birthday party, anniversary, or
family reunion venue
you’re looking for, our flexible space arrangements ensure a memorable experience for you and your guests.
Whether you are hosting 30 people or 300 people, our team can craft the ambiance you are looking for at your catered event in South Florida for an unforgettable experience. Every detail of your function is meticulously planned and flawlessly executed.
An Unbeatable Event Space in Broward County
Nestled amidst the sprawling beauty of the verdant Deer Creek golf course, the ballrooms in South Florida offer a captivating setting for a myriad of occasions. The allure lies not only in the meticulously manicured greens but also in the seamless integration of nature’s charm with our versatile event facilities.
Overlooking the picturesque landscape, our ballrooms in Broward County provide an enchanting backdrop for celebrations, whether it’s a joyous union or a special gathering. Imagine the soothing sound of a cascading waterfall as you revel in the warmth of shared moments within our thoughtfully designed spaces. The transition from the golf course to our ballrooms is a seamless journey, allowing guests to carry the energy and vibrancy from the outdoors to the heart of the celebration.
Our commitment to enhancing your experience extends beyond aesthetics. We understand the essence of a well-rounded event, offering tailored combination packages that intertwine the thrill of golf with the joy of celebrations. Savor the satisfaction of playing a round on our esteemed course before indulging in the festivities within our South Florida ballrooms.
At our event space in South Florida, hosting a catered event in Deer Creek is more than just a gathering; it’s an immersive experience. Whether you are a golf enthusiast, a couple embarking on a new chapter, or a discerning event host, our venue beckons with the promise of creating unforgettable moments amidst the tranquility of nature and appetizing gourmet options our event caterers cook up.
Get in Touch with Our Golf Course Event Space
Make your next event a hit at our golf club in Broward County by organizing your catered event with our team! Get to know colleagues and clients or enjoy special moments with loved ones against a stunning backdrop and delicious food. Transform your next corporate gathering, private party, or celebration into a wonderful memory with our exceptional catering services.
Contact our team today
for a consultation about your catered event at Deer Creek Golf Club. For party planning tips, themes, and other ideas (as well as some tips to improve your golf game), be sure to read our
golf club blog
.
Deer Creek Golf Club
123 Anywhere Street, Deerfield Beach, Florida 33442 USA
Phone: 954-421-5550  FAX: 123-456-7890

Special Events Catering Venue
In South Florida, there is often reason to celebrate. An important part of putting together a successful catered event involves finding the right event space. At Deer Creek Golf & Country Club, our prime South Florida location is only one of the elements that make us an ideal choice for companies and individuals looking to hold a private catered event.
South Florida event venues shine brightest when hosting a diverse range of gatherings. We specialize in hosting unique and memorable catered events, including the following:
Baby Showers
Bat & Bar Mitzvah’s
Birthday Parties
Corporate Events
Graduation
Holiday Dining
Quinceañera’s
Reunions
Sweet Sixteen’s
Special events require special
attention. That
is exactly what you will receive from the professional events and catering team here at Deer Creek. From customizing the perfect menu to creating custom cocktails and other unique touches, know that your catered event is in good hands with Deer Creek.
Catered events can be arranged for a variety of
reasons. They can include corporate
events, private events,
and
business luncheons—the options are endless. Whether you are hosting an event for 35 people or 200 people, Deer Creek has the ambiance you are looking for and the means to make your event unforgettable.
With sweeping views of our pristine golf course and a menu that caters to the even most particular of palates, your Deer Creek event will be a hit – and the details don’t end there. Our in-house catering venue also extends past our ballroom onto our golf course for corporate and special event golf outings and tournaments.
If you are looking for a South Florida catering venue that will entertain your
guests
and surpass their culinary expectations, Deer Creek Golf Club is the perfect venue for you.
Convenient Location
The Deer Creek Country Club in Deerfield Beach,
Florida, is just one
mile west of I-95 on Hillsboro
Boulevard. We are conveniently located
between Fort Lauderdale and Boca
Raton, providing
an exceptional wedding
venue option for all
of Broward County and South Palm Beach.
We also coordinate with couples and families in the creation of their perfect South Florida destination weddings. We have hosted weddings for couples who have traveled from all over the world to South Florida to make their special day that much more magical.
One of the Top Small Party Venues in Broward County
Consider Deer Creek Golf Club’s clubhouse as the ultimate party venue in Fort Lauderdale, FL, and its surrounding areas. As we are nestled in the heart of nature’s beauty, our extraordinary setting combines sophistication with a touch of rustic charm to create the perfect backdrop for your celebration.
The golf course sits as one of the top South Florida event venues because the expansive event spaces offer versatility and can accommodate gatherings of various sizes, from intimate affairs to grand galas. The picturesque views of lush fairways and tranquil lakes provide a captivating ambiance, making it an ideal setting for weddings, birthdays, corporate events, and more.
This is also one of the top
wedding venues in Fort Lauderdale
because of the beautiful views our venue provides for people who choose to celebrate their special occasions with us.
A Unique Social Event Venue in South Florida
Deer Creek Golf Club’s clubhouse stands out as a truly unique social event venue in South Florida for a multitude of compelling reasons. First and foremost, it’s the enchanting fusion of nature and elegance that sets it apart.
What truly makes
Deer Creek Golf Club’s
clubhouse unique is the seamless integration of South Florida’s natural beauty with modern conveniences. Your guests can revel in the serenity of the outdoors while still enjoying the comforts of an upscale indoor setting.
Our clubhouse is the embodiment of Southern Florida’s charm and hospitality, making your social event an unforgettable experience against a backdrop of unparalleled natural splendor.
Why Choose Outdoor South Florida Event Venues?
Selecting an outdoor South Florida event venue is an inspired choice for several compelling reasons. To begin, South Florida’s year-round sunshine and pleasant climate create the perfect backdrop for any gathering. The abundance of natural light, gentle breezes, and the ambiance of lush tropical landscapes contribute to a warm and inviting atmosphere that’s hard to replicate indoors.
Additionally, outdoor venues offer ample space and flexibility for various types of events, from romantic weddings and lively celebrations to corporate meetings and team-building activities.
Whether it’s a sprawling garden or a charming courtyard, Deer Creek’s outdoor South Florida event venues provide a wide range of stunning settings to suit your specific occasion. Many know that our location and amenities provide an exceptional setting for an outdoor garden wedding.
What Kinds of Events are Best for Event Venues in South Florida?
Whether it’s a romantic soirée or a vibrant fiesta, the versatility of South Florida event venues allows for unforgettable experiences. In the case of our venue in Fort Lauderdale, corporate functions and conferences benefit from the inviting outdoor spaces. Our venues are the ideal option for family reunions and charity galas.
More About Deer Creek Golf Club
Let the
Deer Creek Event Catering
professionals assist you in creating your dream wedding.
Contact us directly at
954-426-6588
to tour our facility and
learn more about what makes us one of the top event venues in South Florida.

Golf Course & Club Ballrooms in South Florida
What could be more delightful than celebrating milestone events in the Sunshine State? Whether you seek a picturesque golf course for your wedding or a venue to host a birthday or family party, our South Florida Banquet Rooms offer an ideal setting. Experience it firsthand by visiting our ballrooms in South Florida, especially since our stunning Key West Banquet Room has recently undergone impressive renovations.
Planning
Deer Creek Events
to be hosted at our ballrooms in South Florida is an amazing opportunity to make your next event the best one in years. Between the beauty of the space, the versatility of what we can offer to guests, and the amazing dishes you will be enjoying, you’re sure to fall in love.

Whether you are a golf enthusiast, a couple embarking on a new chapter, or if you are a discerning event host, our venue beckons with the promise of creating unforgettable moments amidst the allure of lush greens and the tranquility of nature.
Our Ballroom for Events of All Kinds
As the best golf course in South Florida, we are proud to serve as a canvas for a diverse range of events. These captivating event spaces in South Florida are uniquely tailored to suit the distinct tastes and preferences of our guests. From the intimate celebration of a baby shower to the grandeur of Bar and Bat Mitzvahs, our South Florida ballrooms transform to accommodate the spirit of each occasion.
Birthdays come to life within our walls, whether it’s a milestone celebration or a more intimate gathering. Our ballrooms can also provide a sophisticated backdrop for corporate events by offering a blend of professionalism and the serenity of our South Florida surroundings. Graduation celebrations echo with pride as graduates and their families relish the achievement in a setting that exudes elegance.
The festive spirit of holidays is heightened within our South Florida ballrooms, where the warmth of the occasion is mirrored in every detail.
Quinceañeras find
a dreamlike setting, as the ballrooms become a stage for the celebration of a young woman’s transition into adulthood. Reunions are redefined in our South Florida event spaces, fostering an atmosphere that encourages reminiscence and reconnecting.
The vibrancy of Sweet Sixteen celebrations resonates in our South Florida ballrooms, capturing the essence of this significant milestone with style. Each event, from the smallest baby shower to the most elaborate benefit gala, is infused with the natural beauty of our South Florida surroundings, creating an ambiance that enhances the joy of the moment. At Deer Creek, our ballrooms in South Florida transcend their physical dimensions to become spaces where the tapestry of life’s celebrations unfold with grace and sophistication.
South Florida Golf Course Dining Options That Can’t Be Beat
Our extensive dinner and lunch menus, available year-round, cater to diverse palates. This ensures there is something for everyone. Should you wish to elevate your event, our collaborative approach allows us to incorporate additional dining options seamlessly.
Explore the culinary delights amid the picturesque setting of one of the finest golf courses in Broward County. Beyond the greens, our venue extends its charm to encompass elegant event spaces, offering the perfect backdrop for celebrations. Host your special occasions in our distinguished ballrooms in South Florida, where the culinary artistry of our chefs meets the allure of the lush surroundings.
Our facilities welcome bookings for any occasion, including hosting events during the holidays, including Christmas and Thanksgiving. Experience the perfect blend of exquisite cuisine and scenic beauty at Deer Creek Grille, where the allure of our luxury experience is available to guests.
Get in Touch With the Deer Creek Golf Club Today
If you’re considering hosting events at ballrooms in South Florida, discover the possibilities awaiting you by
reaching out to us today

We do this whether on or off the course, during a round of golf, or while hosting a ceremony that will be etched in the memories of its attendees forever. Beautiful Event Space for Corporate Events
Throughout the years, Deer Creek has earned itself a reputable name in the Hospitality Industry. Catering to each client individually, the staff creates the perfect atmosphere to ensure every detail meets and exceeds all expectations. Our first class facility is available to the public for groups from 35-200.
Since its renovation in 2012, the Deer Creek Key West Ballroom has been featured in numerous publications including TLC’s Four Weddings TV show. The renovations included French doors throughout the venue, crystal chandeliers and wall sconces. With its large picturesque windows that overlook our signature golf course, it’s obvious why business often book corporate functions in our banquet hall.
Our corporate events catering offers predesigned menus for corporate breakfast, lunch and dinner. These packages are separate by price and offer a variety of options that can be substituted or added to your package at a minimum fee. If the predesigned menus do not fit your company’s needs and/or desires, please contact the Deer Creek corporate catering department at 954-426-6588 to speak with an events coordinator about creating a custom menu.
In order to meet, and exceed, all expectations of corporate events, Deer Creek’s catering department has a separate catering kitchen and staff that is dedicated exclusively to corporate events and banquets.

Board Meeting Event Space
Organizing periodic corporate planning and strategizing sessions is crucial for cultivating a unified and efficient work environment. These sessions offer employees the chance to collaborate, strategize, and forge robust professional relationships. Through participation in planning and strategizing activities, individuals enhance their communication skills, build trust, and align efforts toward shared objectives. A board Meeting event fosters morale and motivation, resulting in heightened satisfaction and morale among your firm’s executives. Hosting your next meeting at our event space for business is a surefire way to blow your executives away with the effort and care put into the experience.
Consider Our Corporate Meeting Space
When contemplating the optimal venue for your company board meeting, our
golf club in Broward County
emerges as the premier choice for several compelling reasons. Firstly, our ability to accommodate a wide range of group sizes, from intimate gatherings to larger teams of up to 200 guests, ensures that your board meeting event can be tailored precisely to your needs, fostering an environment conducive to collaboration and professional synergy.
Our renowned Key West Ballroom, the highlight of our business event space, has gained recognition on numerous television shows for its sophistication and adaptability. Boasting expansive windows that offer panoramic views of our signature golf course, the Key West Ballroom provides a breathtaking backdrop that stimulates creativity and engagement among attendees. Whether soaking in the natural light filtering through the windows or admiring the scenic beauty outdoors, participants are certain to find inspiration in their surroundings.
Our dedication to providing an unforgettable experience extends beyond aesthetics to encompass exceptional service and amenities. Our experienced staff is committed to ensuring that every aspect of your corporate planning workshops and events runs seamlessly, from initial planning stages to execution. With our attentive hospitality and professional expertise, you can be confident that your planning and strategizing event at the
Deer Creek Golf Course
will exceed expectations, leaving a lasting impression on all participants.
Features of Our Corporate Event Space
At Deer Creek, we take pride in providing an array of features that enhance corporate planning and strategizing to new heights. One notable aspect is our exquisite corporate event spaces, meticulously designed to accommodate corporate gatherings of all sizes and preferences. Whether you envision an intimate brainstorming session or a grand strategic planning event, our versatile layout caters to your every need.
Central to our commitment to excellence is the provision of exceptional dining experiences. Our carefully crafted pre-designed menus for breakfast, lunch, and dinner showcase culinary delights that tantalize the taste buds and energize the mind. From gourmet breakfast spreads to lavish banquet dinners, each menu is created with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring a gastronomic journey that delights and satisfies every palate.
Our business meeting space is perfect for corporate planning and strategizing events of all kinds, offering the ideal backdrop for fostering teamwork, communication, and strategic alignment. Whether you’re organizing strategic planning sessions, collaborative workshops, or outdoor strategic team challenges, our flexible layout can be tailored to suit your specific requirements, ensuring a seamless and unforgettable experience for all participants.
In addition to our outstanding amenities and culinary offerings, our dedicated events team is on hand to assist you every step of the way. From the initial planning stages to on-the-day coordination, we are committed to ensuring that your corporate board meeting event runs smoothly and exceeds expectations. With us as your partner, you can rest assured that your corporate event will be a resounding success, leaving a lasting impression on your team members and fostering a spirit of unity and achievement.
Get in Touch with Our Golf Club Event Space
Are you interested in making your next business board meeting event an unforgettable experience in one of the most beautiful corporate event spaces in all of South Florida? If so, be sure to consider us as the unbeatable difference-maker!
Get in touch with our team
today to learn more about scheduling or to have any questions answered by one of our professionals. If you are interested in insights from experts in both event hosting and golfing in Broward County, be sure to take a look at some of our
golf & event blog articles
! We look forward to hosting your next event!

Deer Creek Golf Fundraising Event Space
Nestled amidst the scenic landscapes of South Florida, Deer Creek Golf Club stands not only as a premier golf destination but also as a distinguished venue for hosting impactful and memorable fundraising events. With its meticulously manicured fairways, upscale amenities, and a commitment to unparalleled service, our golf course in Deerfield Beach provides a distinctive space for organizations seeking to organize successful golf fundraisers. Whether you are planning a charity tournament, a corporate fundraising event, or a community-driven initiative,
Deer Creek Golf Club
offers a picturesque setting that combines the thrill of the game with the opportunity to make a meaningful impact.
How Much Do Golf Fundraisers Make?
Golf fundraisers have become popular among charitable groups and non-profits looking to generate funds in a fun and sociable setting. Golf fundraisers’ financial performance can vary greatly depending on several variables, including the organization’s reputation, the event’s size, and the degree of community involvement.
Local fundraisers that are small may only bring in a few thousand dollars, but well-established, larger events put on by well-known charities might bring in hundreds of thousands or even millions of dollars. The money raised is frequently obtained from donations, sponsorships, participant registration fees, and extra events like raffles or auctions. Effective golf fundraisers promote a feeling of community and involvement in addition to raising money for the cause.
The creative strategies used by organizers to draw sponsors and players will also have an impact on the golf fundraiser’s financial outcome. Offering unique experiences, such as celebrity golf tournaments, VIP dinners, or corporate sponsorship packages, can dramatically increase fundraising possibilities.
Furthermore, obtaining sponsorships and increasing attendance are largely dependent on efficient marketing and outreach initiatives. Effective golf fundraisers make use of the sport’s appeal and pair it with a worthy cause to draw in a wide range of supporters. Ultimately, organizational planning, community involvement, and strategic alliances interact dynamically to make golf fundraisers financially successful.
How Do You Plan a Golf Fundraiser?
A good golf fundraiser needs to be carefully organized and meticulously planned. A well-thought-out plan is crucial to ensuring that the fundraiser meets its financial objectives and offers attendees a great experience, regardless of skill level in event planning. Start by outlining the event’s objectives and purpose, figuring out how much money is needed, and deciding how the money will be used for the selected charity. Establishing a budget, locating a suitable golf course venue, and developing a timeframe are crucial components in the initial planning stages. Furthermore, contemplate integrating engaging events like competitions, sales, or endorsements to improve the whole encounter and enhance the possibility of generating funds.
There are several facets to a golf tournament fundraiser checklist, including:
Define Goals and Objectives:
Set clear fundraising goals.
Identify the cause or project that will benefit from the funds.
Create a Budget:
Outline all expenses, including venue costs, catering, and promotional materials.
Allocate funds for potential unforeseen expenses.
Select a Suitable Venue:
Choose a golf course that fits the size and scale of your event.
Confirm availability and negotiate pricing.
Develop a Marketing Plan:
Create a promotional strategy to attract participants and sponsors.
Utilize social media, email campaigns, and traditional media channels.
Create a Registration Process:
Set up a user-friendly online registration system.
Communicate registration fees and inclusions.
Provide Sponsorship Opportunities:
Create attractive sponsorship packages.
Reach out to potential sponsors and partners.
Plan Event Logistics:
Develop a detailed timeline for the day of the event.
Coordinate with the golf course staff for logistics such as tee times, carts, and scoring.
Arrange On-site Activities:
Consider additional fundraising activities like contests, auctions, or raffles.
Ensure a seamless flow of events during the tournament.
Elevate the Participant Experience:
Provide participant gifts or swag bags.
Consider food and beverage options during and after the tournament.
Deliver Post-Event Recognition:
Acknowledge sponsors, participants, and volunteers.
Share the success of the fundraiser with the community through various channels.
A golf fundraiser must be carefully planned and executed with an emphasis on making the event enjoyable for everyone involved. Organizers can optimize the event’s fundraising potential and cultivate a sense of community and support for the cause by adhering to a detailed checklist and paying close attention to the details.
Take Golf Fundraising to the Next Level at Deer Creek
Not only are we one of the best wedding venues in Florida, but we are also an optimal setting for
corporate golf events
and the like. Deer Creek Golf Club goes beyond providing a picturesque backdrop for golf fundraisers; we offer a seamless fusion of hospitality and elegance. Our beautifully designed
golf course
, complemented by top-notch amenities and a dedicated events team, ensures that every aspect of your fundraising event is executed with precision and flair. From charity tournaments to corporate outings, our versatile venue caters to a
variety of events
, providing a unique blend of scenic beauty and professional service.
Contact us
today to learn more.

Best South Florida Golf Membership at Deer Creek Golf Club
At
Deer Creek Golf Club
, we pride ourselves on offering the best South Florida golf membership opportunities. As a golfer, you deserve more than just rounds of golf; you deserve a golfing experience that goes beyond the ordinary. That’s precisely what our memberships provide – a gateway to a world of golfing excellence.
Is a Golf Membership Worth It?
Absolutely, a golf membership at Deer Creek Golf Club is undeniably worth it. Beyond the exceptional rounds of golf on our picturesque course, membership grants you access to a world of benefits and experiences that extend far beyond the fairways. It’s an investment in forging lasting connections with fellow golf enthusiasts, participating in exciting tournaments, and relishing exclusive events. The question isn’t whether a golf membership is worth it; it’s how soon you can become a part of this extraordinary golfing family.
Membership That Elevates Your Golfing Experience
While Deer Creek Golf Club welcomes the public with open arms, our golf memberships offer exclusive benefits that make their golfing journey truly exceptional. We offer a variety of membership options tailored to suit your preferences:
Single Adult Membership
: Perfect for individuals seeking a personal golfing sanctuary.
Family Membership
: Ideal for families who share a passion for golf and want to create lasting memories together on the course.
Junior Membership
: Designed for our young golf enthusiasts, nurturing their love for the game from an early age.
Corporate Membership
: Tailored to cater to businesses that recognize the value of golf in building connections and fostering relationships. Explore
our corporate golf tournaments
.
The Deer Creek Group – Where Golf Becomes a Social Affair
One of the highlights of our golf club membership is the daily “Deer Creek Group” golf game. This beloved tradition has been a favorite among our members for many years. It’s not just about golf; it’s about camaraderie, friendly competition, and the joy of sharing the fairways with like-minded enthusiasts.
Weekly Tournaments With a Golf Course Membership
As a member of Deer Creek Golf Club, you’ll find your calendar filled with exciting opportunities to test your skills. Our fun-filled weekly golf tournaments are a chance to showcase your prowess on the course. Prizes await the winners, adding an extra layer of excitement to your golfing experience.
The Deer Creek Advantage
What sets our golf club membership apart? It’s the Deer Creek Advantage:
Scenic Beauty
:

Explore the Perfect Membership for You
Becoming a member at Deer Creek Golf Club means embracing a golfing lifestyle that’s filled with excitement, camaraderie, and excellence. Whether you’re an individual golfer, part of a golf-loving family, a junior player, or a business looking to enhance relationships, there’s a membership that’s perfect for you.
Your Path to the Golf Club Membership in South Florida
Your journey to the best South Florida golf membership begins here at Deer Creek Golf Club. Experience golfing excellence like never before, elevate your game, and become part of a vibrant golfing community.
How Do You Join a Golf Club?
Joining Deer Creek Golf Club is simple. Contact our friendly team today to learn more about our various membership options and the process of becoming a member. We’re here to assist you in taking the first step toward an exciting golfing journey.

to embark on a golfing journey that promises excitement, camaraderie, and unparalleled excellence on the fairways. Your tee time awaits.

Corporate Team-Building Event Space
Hosting an occasional corporate team-building event is essential for fostering a cohesive and productive work environment. These events provide opportunities for employees to bond, collaborate, and develop strong interpersonal relationships. By engaging in corporate team-building activities, individuals learn to communicate effectively, trust one another, and work towards common goals. Corporate events for team-building boost morale and motivation, leading to increased job satisfaction and employee retention.
If you are interested in hosting such an event for your employees, it is important to have the right space available. Luckily,
Deer Creek Golf Club
offers an amazing opportunity for you and your team to get closer to each other in a luxurious and comfortable setting.
Why Choose Our Space for Team-Building at Corporate Events
When considering the ideal venue for your corporate team-building event, our golf club in Broward County stands out as the premier choice for several compelling reasons. Firstly, our capability to accommodate a wide range of group sizes, from intimate gatherings to larger teams of up to 200 guests, ensures that your event can be tailored precisely to your needs, fostering an environment conducive to collaboration and camaraderie.
Our famous Key West Ballroom, the standout among our spaces, has garnered recognition on numerous television shows for its elegance and versatility. Featuring expansive windows that offer panoramic views of our
signature golf course
, the Key West Ballroom provides a breathtaking backdrop that inspires creativity and engagement among attendees. Whether basking in the natural light filtering through the windows or marveling at the scenic beauty outdoors, participants are sure to find inspiration in their surroundings.
Our commitment to providing an unforgettable experience extends beyond aesthetics to encompass exceptional service and amenities. Our experienced staff is dedicated to ensuring that every aspect of your corporate team-building workshops and events runs seamlessly, from initial planning stages to execution. With our attentive hospitality and professional expertise, you can trust that your team-building event at the Deer Creek golf course and club will exceed expectations, leaving a lasting impression on all participants.
Features of Our Corporate Event Space
Our team at Deer Creek prides itself on offering an array of features that elevate your team-building activities for corporations to new heights. One standout aspect is our exquisite event space, meticulously designed to accommodate gatherings of all sizes and preferences. Whether you envision an intimate brainstorming session or a grand gala, our versatile layout caters to your every need.
Our Dining Options
Central to our commitment to excellence is the provision of exceptional dining experiences. Our curated pre-designed menus for breakfast, lunch, and dinner showcase culinary delights that tantalize the taste buds and energize the mind. From gourmet breakfast spreads to lavish banquet dinners, each menu is crafted with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring a gastronomic journey that delights and satisfies every palate.
Flexible Layout
Our golf club event space is perfect for corporate team-building events of all kinds, offering the ideal backdrop for fostering teamwork, communication, and camaraderie. Whether you’re organizing trust-building exercises, collaborative workshops, or outdoor team challenges, our flexible layout can be tailored to suit your specific requirements, ensuring a seamless and unforgettable experience for all participants.
Hands-on Staff
In addition to our outstanding amenities and culinary offerings, our dedicated events team is on hand to assist you every step of the way. From initial planning stages to on-the-day coordination, we are committed to ensuring that your event runs smoothly and exceeds expectations. With us as your partner, you can rest assured that your corporate team-building event will be a resounding success, leaving a lasting impression on your team members and fostering a spirit of unity and achievement.
Contact the Leader Among South Florida Golf Clubs
Are you interested in making your next corporate team-building event a collaborative experience in one of the most beautiful
event spaces in all of South Florida
? If so, be sure to consider us as the unbeatable difference-maker!
Get in touch with our team
today to learn more about scheduling or to have any questions answered by one of our professionals. If you are interested in additional insights from experts in both event hosting and golfing in Broward County, be sure to take a look at our
event and golf blog
! We look forward to hosting your next event!
